title: Earth Rover Program Launches Globally on World Soil Day, Unveils Scientific Concept of “Soilsmology”
description: Earth Rover Program launches “soilsmology,” a low-cost seismic tool revealing soil health to boost sustainable farming and combat global soil decline.......
